findHumansHomonymes.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type isnt 'entity' or doc.redirect? then return

  normalize = (label)->
    label
    .trim()
    .replace(/\s\w{1}\.\s?/g, ' ')
    .replace(/\s\s/g, ' ')
    .toLowerCase()

  # Keep only humans
  unless doc.claims?['wdt:P31']?[0] is 'wd:Q5' then return

  if doc.labels? and doc.claims?

    labelsSet = {}

    for lang, label of doc.labels
      normalizedLabel = normalize label
      labelsSet[normalizedLabel] = true

    # Use a set to prevent emitting several times the same label
    # just because an entity as the same label in several languages
    Object.keys(labelsSet).forEach (label)-> emit label, null
